## fecha-hora a UTC

```{r}

end_dateCR <- floor_date(now(), "week")
start_dateCR <- end_dateCR - weeks(5)+ days(1)

initial_date <- with_tz(start_dateCR, tzone = "UTC") 
final_date <- with_tz(end_dateCR, tzone = "UTC") 

```
